Item.name: linearized
Item.description: Uses linear model during homotopy initialization

ScalarVariable.name: grid.phiSou
ScalarVariable.description: Phase shift angle of the source

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.potentialReference
ScalarVariable.description: Serve as potential root for the reference angle theta

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.definiteReference
ScalarVariable.description: Serve as definite root for the reference angle theta

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.S[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Complex power S[1] = P, S[2]= Q

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.S[2]
ScalarVariable.description: Complex power S[1] = P, S[2]= Q

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Phase shift with respect to reference angle

ScalarVariable.name: grid.sou.thetaRel
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angle of rotating system as offset to thetaRef

ScalarVariable.name: RL.linearized
ScalarVariable.description: If true, the load model is linearized

ScalarVariable.name: RL.mode
ScalarVariable.description: Type of load model (e.g., steady state, dynamic, prescribed power consumption, etc.)

ScalarVariable.name: RL.P_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal power (negative if consumed, positive if generated). Used if mode <> Buildings.Electrical.Types.Load.VariableZ_P_input

ScalarVariable.name: RL.P
ScalarVariable.description: Power of the load (negative if consumed, positive if fed into the electrical grid)

ScalarVariable.name: RL.y_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input load for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: RL.P_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input power for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: RL.load
ScalarVariable.description: Internal representation of control signal, used to avoid singularity

ScalarVariable.name: RL.eps
ScalarVariable.description: Small number used to avoid a singularity if the power is zero

ScalarVariable.name: RL.oneEps
ScalarVariable.description: Small number used to avoid a singularity if the power is zero

ScalarVariable.name: RL.use_pf_in
ScalarVariable.description: If true, the power factor is defined by an input

ScalarVariable.name: RL.pf_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input load for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: RL.theRef
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angle of rotating reference system

ScalarVariable.name: der(RL.theRef)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Absolute angle of rotating reference system)

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.fAct
ScalarVariable.description: Fraction of surface area with active solar cells

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.fAct
ScalarVariable.description: Fraction of surface area with active solar cells

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.G
ScalarVariable.description: Total solar irradiation per unit area

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.linearized
ScalarVariable.description: If =true, introduce a linearization in the load

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.linearized
ScalarVariable.description: If true, the load model is linearized

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.mode
ScalarVariable.description: Type of load model (e.g., steady state, dynamic, prescribed power consumption, etc.)

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.P_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal power (negative if consumed, positive if generated). Used if mode <> Buildings.Electrical.Types.Load.VariableZ_P_input

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.P
ScalarVariable.description: Power of the load (negative if consumed, positive if fed into the electrical grid)

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.y_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input load for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.P_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input power for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.load
ScalarVariable.description: Internal representation of control signal, used to avoid singularity

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.eps
ScalarVariable.description: Small number used to avoid a singularity if the power is zero

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.oneEps
ScalarVariable.description: Small number used to avoid a singularity if the power is zero

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.use_pf_in
ScalarVariable.description: If true, the power factor is defined by an input

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.pf_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Hidden value of the input load for the conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.load.theRef
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angle of rotating reference system

ScalarVariable.name: der(pvOriented.panel.load.theRef)
ScalarVariable.description: der(Absolute angle of rotating reference system)

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.panel.gain_DCAC.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.weaBus.cloTim
ScalarVariable.description: Day number with units of seconds

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.weaBus.solZen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.weaBus.solZen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.weaBus.cloTim
ScalarVariable.description: Day number with units of seconds

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.outSkyCon
ScalarVariable.description: Output contribution of diffuse irradiation from sky

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.outGroCon
ScalarVariable.description: Output contribution of diffuse irradiation from ground

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.HDifTil.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.HDifTil.incAng
ScalarVariable.description: Solar incidence angle on the surface

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.HDifTil.HGroDifTil
ScalarVariable.description: Hemispherical diffuse solar irradiation on a tilted surface from the ground

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.HDifTil.HSkyDifTil
ScalarVariable.description: Hemispherical diffuse solar irradiation on a tilted surface from the sky

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.skyCle.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.skyCle.skyCle
ScalarVariable.description: Sky clearness. skyCle=1: overast sky; skyCle=8: clear sky

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.skyCle.HDifHorBou
ScalarVariable.description: Diffuse horizontal irradiation, bounded away from zero

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.briCoe.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.briCoe.skyCle
ScalarVariable.description: Sky clearness. skyCle=1: overcast sky; skyCle=8 clear sky

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.relAirMas.zen
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.relAirMas.zenLim
ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle bounded from above by 90 degree

ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.description: Day number with units of seconds

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.incAng.incAng.azi
ScalarVariable.description: Surface azimuth. azi=-90 degree if surface outward unit normal points toward east; azi=0 if it points toward south

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDifTil.incAng.incAng.til
ScalarVariable.description: Surface tilt. til=90 degree for walls; til=0 for ceilings; til=180 for roof

ScalarVariable.description: Incidence angle on a tilted surface

ScalarVariable.description: Zenith angle of the sun beam

ScalarVariable.description: Day number with units of seconds

ScalarVariable.name: pvOriented.HDirTil.incAng.incAng.azi
ScalarVariable.description: Surface azimuth. azi=-90 degree if surface outward unit normal points toward east; azi=0 if it points toward south

ScalarVariable.description: Surface tilt. til=90 degree for walls; til=0 for ceilings; til=180 for roof

ScalarVariable.description: Incidence angle on a tilted surface
